//palin mirrored thingy
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

short get_index(char s, string S){
    for(int i=0;i<S.length();i++){
        if(s==S[i])return i;
    }
    return -1;
}

string reverse(string s){
    string r="";
    for(int i=s.length()-1;i>-1;i--){
        r+=s[i];
    }
    return r;
}

string mirror(string s){
    string nor_a = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ123456789";
    string mir_a = "A000300HIL0JM0O0002TUVWXY51SE0Z0080";
    for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++){
        s[i]=mir_a[get_index(s[i],nor_a)];
    }
    return reverse(s);
}

bool palin(string s){
    if(s==reverse(s))return true;
    return false;
}

int main(){
    int t;
    string s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>s;
        if(palin(s) && mirror(s)==s)cout<<s<<" is a mirrored palindrome."<<endl;
        else if(palin(s) && mirror(s)!=s)cout<<s<<" is a regular palindrome."<<endl;
        else if(mirror(s)==s)cout<<s<<" is a mirrored string."<<endl;
        else cout<<s<<" is not a palindrome."<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
